title: ELEMENT_GET Function
description:
ELEMENT_GET passes the item at the position POS from a list. The list conï¿¾sists of strings which are separated by the separation character SEP. The

frst element of the list has the position 0
name: ELEMENT_GET

input.name: SEP
input.description: The separation character of the elements.

input.name: POS
input.description: The zero-based index of the item to retrieve.

input.name: ELEMENT
input.description: The input list of elements, consisting of strings separated by the separation character.

output.name: STRING
output.description: The output string corresponding to the element at the specified position.

return_value.description: Returns the element found at the specified position in the input list.
